content.html: I genuinely don’t know how anyone can look at the hate on JK Rowling’s Twitter and still hold any love in their heart for Harry Potter. She’s not just a transphobe. She’s THE transphobe. And she normalizes it daily to 13 million people on Twitter. It’s so painful to watch.
content.value:
I genuinely don’t know how anyone can look at the hate on JK Rowling’s Twitter and still hold any love in their heart for Harry Potter. 

She’s not just a transphobe. She’s THE transphobe. And she normalizes it daily to 13 million people on Twitter. 

It’s so painful to watch.
